sources.title: The Fugitive
sources.description: Title: The Fugitive Summary: A barber commits a petty theft, which leads to his becoming involved in blackmail and murder. Directed by: Brian Desmond Hurst Actors: Ralph Richardson, Diana Wynyard, Romney Brent Production Company: Greenspan & Seligman Enterprises Ltd. Release Date: 22 July 1940 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A barber steals £100 from a tailor to settle his extravagant wife's debts. Discovering who committed the theft the tailor starts to blackmail the barber. When a fire breaks out in the tenements and spreads through the area the barber murders the tailor
